description:
Looking for a nice-smelling hand sanitizer? This organic blend from Dr. Bronner’s is just as effective as conventional sanitizers, but with a natural lavender scent. Spritz it on your hands to kill bacteria when there’s no access to soap and water – great for sticky kids’ fingers or faces, and super useful for camping trips. You can spray it in the air to freshen up funky smelling rooms, too.

  • Made of organic ethyl alcohol, water, organic lavender oil and organic glycerin
  • Organic and Fair Trade Certified ingredients
name: Dr. Bronner's Lavender Organic Hand Sanitizer 59ml
